name: Screw Thy Neighbor
description: Screw Thy Neighbor is a simple card game.  The object is to avoid the lowest card by trading it with the person sitting next to you if you wish (or the deck).  If you have the lowest card at the end of the round, you have to put a dollar in the pot.  The winner is the last person remaining!  Features a handsome and user-friendly interface, computer opponents, customizable options, sound effects, and also keeps track of stats.
